T02TD2827E:174a-0: @174a * // bcom ldan 'das pha rol gyi dpung las rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2827E:174a-1: brtan pa rnams kyis chos kyi srid //
T02TD2827E:174a-2: pha rol 'jigs las bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2827E:174a-3: rdo rje 'jigs byed thugs rje khros //
T02TD2827E:174a-4: gzhan gyis mi thub cho ga brjod //
T02TD2827E:174a-5: de la pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni /
T02TD2827E:174a-7: nges par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2827E:174a-9: 'dir 'jigs par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T02TD2827E:174a-10: thog mar mtshan ma grub pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2827E:174a-11: ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam /
T02TD2827E:174a-12: thun mong ma yin pa'i rab tu gnas pas gnas par byas pa'i rten gyi mdun du song ste /
T02TD2827E:174a-13: rang bzhin ma lus kyis gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2827E:174a-14: 'dod pa drag pos thal mo sbyar te shin tu rab tu gus pas re bar bya'o //
T02TD2827E:174a-15: rten gang thugs dkyil thugs rje khros //
T02TD2827E:174a-16: rdo rje 'jigs byed bcu drug sor //
T02TD2827E:174a-17: mi bzad rngam zhing rnam 'gyur ba //
T02TD2827E:174a-18: bsgoms la ye shes bstim par bya //
T02TD2827E:174a-19: rang snying nyid dbus h'um ngam hr'i: /'bar ba yongs gyur rdo rje blta //
T02TD2827E:174a-20: de nyid brjod pas 'jigs byed nyid //
T02TD2827E:174a-22: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ma he'i zhal //
T02TD2827E:174a-23: de g-yas 'bar ba sngags phyag rgya //
T02TD2827E:174a-24: gnam lcags me dpung rlung dmar dang //
T02TD2827E:174a-25: nyi ma dang ni mkha' lding ngo //
T02TD2827E:174a-26: g-yon du sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags //
T02TD2827E:174a-27: zla ba dang ni dgra sta'o //
T02TD2827E:174a-28: nyi shu gcig dang brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2827E:174a-29: yang na stong phrag gcig par du //
T02TD2827E:174a-30: rdo rje 'bar ba yi ge gcig / dpa' bos rngam par rnam par bzla //
T02TD2827E:174a-31: de nas lha la lus bstims la //
T02TD2827E:174a-32: sku chen ri rab mnyam pa yis //
T02TD2827E:174a-33: yi ge gcig brjod 'od phyung la //
T02TD2827E:174a-34: pha rol rjes skyob zil mnan bya //
T02TD2827E:174a-35: rkang pa g-yas ni bteg nas su //
T02TD2827E:174a-36: zhags pas drangs te mgo bo brdzi //
T02TD2827E:174a-37: g-yon brkyang nga ro 'bar ba yis //
T02TD2827E:174a-38: gsus pa dral nas rgyu ma mnan //
T02TD2827E:174a-39: pha rol dmag dang g-yul 'khor bcas //
T02TD2827E:174a-40: phyag rgya lnga yi las rim gyis //
T02TD2827E:174b-0: thal ba tsam du 'ang ma lus @174b dang //
T02TD2827E:174b-1: yang na rdo rje zhags pas bcings //
T02TD2827E:174b-8: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra bandha m'a ra ya rbad /
T02TD2827E:174b-9: rdo rje zhags pas bcing ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2827E:174b-10: rdo rje rtse dang thabs chen shing //
T02TD2827E:174b-11: ri gzar rtsva dang gtsub shing me //
T02TD2827E:174b-12: bya rgod kyi ni dang ru g-yas //
T02TD2827E:174b-13: yungs kar phye ma thal chen bsres //
T02TD2827E:174b-14: gsang sngags rgyal po 'bum bzlas la //
T02TD2827E:174b-15: dmag tshogs myos pa 'ongs pa yi //
T02TD2827E:174b-16: gdong du khros pas gtor byas te //
T02TD2827E:174b-17: phat ces drag pos skrag par bya'o //
T02TD2827E:174b-18: wa rnams la ni seng ge bzhin //
T02TD2827E:174b-19: mthong ba tsam gyis dngang 'bros pa'am //
T02TD2827E:174b-20: ro langs la ni gsang sngags bzhin //
T02TD2827E:174b-22: ji ste spogs pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2827E:174b-23: myos byed rdzas bdun sbyar ba dang //
T02TD2827E:174b-24: 'jigs byed chen po sku phyar la //
T02TD2827E:174b-25: bdug pa lnga bsregs rnga chen brdung //
T02TD2827E:174b-26: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs dpal che //
T02TD2827E:174b-27: rab tu gsad pa'i rtog pa las //
T02TD2827E:174b-28: legs phung pha rol dpung bzlog pa //
T02TD2827E:174b-29: snyigs dus bstan pa bsrung ba yin //
T02TD2827E:174b-30: pha rol gyi sde gzhom pa rdzogs so//
